Migrate Namespace Usage

migrate_namespace.Rd

Automatically refactors code to replace one package dependency with another. Useful for migrating from 'tidytable' to 'dplyr' or vice versa.

Usage

migrate_namespace(
  dir_path,
  from_pkg = "tidytable",
  to_pkg = "dplyr",
  dry_run = TRUE
)

Arguments

dir_path

String. Path to the project root.

from_pkg

String. The package to remove (e.g., "tidytable").

to_pkg

String. The package to replace it with (e.g., "dplyr").

dry_run

Logical. If TRUE, only shows what would change without writing files.
